mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(title, content, region_num, season, TIME, cost, TYPE, thumbnail, created_date, member_num) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{region_num}, #{season}, #{time}, #{cost}, #{type}, #{thumbnail}, NOW(), #{member_num})
mapper.select: SELECT R1.* FROM( SELECT p.post_num, p.thumbnail, p.title, p.season, p.`type`, m.nickname, l.region FROM post AS p, member AS m, location AS l WHERE p.member_num = m.num AND p.region_num = l.num ) R1 ORDER BY post_num DESC LIMIT #{sno}, #{eno}
